body_content.explanation: relating to a bibliography (= a list of the books, etc. that have been used when writing a particular book or article, or a list of the books from a particular writer or publisher or on a particular subject):
examples: Bibliographic references are cited within the text.
Further bibliographical references will be given below.
The book has been re-edited and now contains important bibliographic notes.

body_content.explanation: relating to libraries and the books and information they contain, and how to find them:
examples: She is head of bibliographic services at a large community college library.
The librarians built a successful relationship with the faculty through bibliographic instruction.
